import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import { TouchableOpacity, StyleSheet } from "react-native";
import { Container, Content, View } from "native-base";
import { Col, Row, Grid } from "react-native-easy-grid";

import Header from "../../components/Header";
import Typography from "../../components/Typography";

import global from "../../utils/GlobalStyles";

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  box: {
    alignItems: "flex-start",
    flex: 1,
    flexDirection: "row",
    justifyContent: "space-between",
    paddingVertical: 26,
    paddingHorizontal: 20,
  },
  half: {
    width: "50%",
  },
  right: {
    textAlign: "right",
  },
});

const basicInfo = {
  nickname: "Neriberi",
  mobile: "+63 123 456 7890",
  email: "neri@singlife.com",
  address: "Unit 123 Tower 1 Sunshine 100 City Plaza, #4 Pioneer Street, Buayang Bato",
  full_name: "Neri Lou Flores",
  gender: "Female",
  birthdate: "Jan 00, 1900",
  place_of_birth: "Pasay City",
  civil: "Married",
  nationality: "Filipino",
  us_resident: "No",
  political_exposed: "No",
  primary_source_of_fund: "Salary",
  gov_id: "Driver's License",
};

export default function Information({ navigation }) {
  return (
    <Container>
      <Header back backAction={() => navigation.navigate("Profile")} transparent />

      <Content style={global.wrapper}>
        <View>
          <View style={[global.content, { paddingBottom: 0 }]}>
            <Typography type="title2" text="Profile Information" />
          </View>

          <Grid style={global.body}>
            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="NICKNAME" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.nickname} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="MOBILE" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.mobile} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="EMAIL" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.email} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="ADDRESS" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.address} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.content}>
                  <Typography type="body-bold" text="To change the information below, you'll need to verify your identity again." />
                </View>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="FULL NAME" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.full_name} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="GENDER" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.gender} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="DATE OF BIRTH" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.birthdate} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="PLACE OF BIRTH" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.place_of_birth} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="CIVIL STATUS" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.civil} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="NATIONALITY" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.nationality} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="US RESIDENT/CITIZEN" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.us_resident} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="POLITICALLY EXPOSED PERSON" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.political_exposed} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="PRIMARY SOURCE OF FUND" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.primary_source_of_fund} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <View style={global.rowSeparator} />
              </Col>
            </Row>

            <Row size={4}>
              <Col>
                <TouchableOpacity transparent style={styles.box}>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body-bold" text="ID" /></View>
                  <View style={styles.half}><Typography type="body" style={styles.right} text={basicInfo.gov_id} /></View>
                </TouchableOpacity>
              </Col>
            </Row>
          </Grid>
        </View>
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

Information.propTypes = {
  navigation: PropTypes.objectOf(PropTypes.any).isRequired,
};
